name: 10 Second Transportation LLC
description:
10 Second Transportation LLC Travel Agency

We carry your loved ones to infinite destinations only in seconds, Since 2453!

We only hire skilled drivers. Are you up to task?

You -the player- is one of our speedbus driver. Drive through inverse dimensions, travel forward and back in time, but only forward in space.

Our special inversequantumengine9000 with just a single button press, can create inverse realities and drive through them.

Take your passenger to their destinations within 10 second quantumengine limit.

If you pass limits you’ll get lost in other dimensions.

Also try not to crush.

Have a nice trip.

Hello, We made this project fully improvisational and had so much fun time (not to mention unity crashes) during this jam. We had lots of ideas during development process but did have little time for all. So our aim was to close gameloop as quickly as possible. We sacrificed some extra mechanics, collectibles, upgrade systems and narrative, but the game itself has a strong foundation already.
